fields_of_interest: Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: SET-Plan, Horizon 2020, Horizon Europe, ETIP SNET, RES-Directive, Water Framework Directive, Energy Efficiency, Electricity Market Design, Energy Union
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: ANDRITZ HYDRO GmbH, a subsidiary of Andritz AG, is an energy service provider that markets and supplies electro-mechanical systems and services for hydropower plants. The company manufactures and supplies hydropower generation products such as Penstocks and Gates, Turbines, Hydro generators, Valves, Control, Protection and Excitation Systems, Electrical Power Systems, Online Monitoring and Diagnosis Systems. ANDRITZ HYDRO undertakes R&D activities in areas such as turbine designing, generator designing, automation and electrical power system.  ANDRITZ HYDRO is headquartered in Vienna, Austria.
